name: Unification Energy Corp.
overview:
Join us in driving the future

Unification Energy partners with Automakers, Conversion companies and Public Transportation Authorities to facilitate the penetration of Electric Vehicles into the main stream of transportation. It provides refueling infrastructure and services to the global EV industry to help consumers make a seamless transition to clean energy transportation without compromise.

UEC envisions a world where people drive high performance cars powered by the speed of electrons generated from clean energy sources; a world where we wake up every morning feeling rejuvenated by the purity of the air around us; a world where we lead a healthy and productive life.

Management Team Raj Chowdhury, CEO (MS, Tufts University) Eashwer Kollata, CTO (MS, UT Austin) Haris Doumanidis, Chief Technologist (PhD, MIT)

milestones.description: Unification added Raj Chowdhury as CEO
